thread.title: Joan D
thread.title_full: Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Joan D

author: Joan D
title: Joan D
text: Working with Emory at the Buddy Allen Carpet One on Lebanon Rd was great! Emory's knowledge and experience were tremendously helpful to me in choosing the perfect carpet for my hall and stairs! The quality of my new carpet is excellent! The installers Doug and Dustin did an outstanding job! They were very skillful, efficient and super courteous and informative! Everything looks wonderful! I highly recommend this group!
